# @webpack-blocks/dev-server2 - Changelog

## 0.4.0

- Make `dev-server2` composable (calling it multiple times in a single config works as expected; see [#78](https://github.com/andywer/webpack-blocks/pull/78))

## 0.3.0

Initial non-beta release. Aligned with the v0.3 release changes.

## 0.1.0-beta

Initial beta release.
